thread.title_full: Anthony Chough Joins 3Pillar Global as Chief Technology Officer

author: Will Sherlin
title: Anthony Chough Joins 3Pillar Global as Chief Technology Officer
text:
3Pillar Global, a leading developer of innovative software products, today announced that Anthony (Tony) Chough has been hired as the company's Chief Technology Officer. The addition of Chough to 3Pillar's executive team will help fuel the company's vertical-based expansion strategy in the Health & Wellness, Financial Services, Media & Entertainment, and Information Services verticals. As Chief Technology Officer, Chough will oversee 3Pillar’s Product and Engineering organizations. He will work with 3Pillar's teams across the globe to foster industry-leading best practices for building revenue-generating software products for clients. Chough will also help set the direction of the company's Advanced Technology Group and 3Pillar Labs, which serves as 3Pillar's R&D arm for exploring business-driven applications of emerging technologies.
"Tony has a wealth of experience overseeing international technology teams in verticals that are core to 3Pillar's business," said David DeWolf, CEO of 3Pillar Global. "We are looking forward to having Tony help set our strategic direction as a company, serve our existing client base, and drive demand for new service lines in emerging technology areas."
Chough has hands-on experience commercializing game-changing software products that leverage SOA, SaaS, Big Data, Cloud, and Mobile technologies. Prior to joining 3Pillar, Chough served as Senior Vice President of the Product Development Group for EngagePoint, where he oversaw EngagePoint's Product Management and Global Application Development teams. He has also held senior leadership roles at companies including HealthLand, LexisNexis, and PNC Financial Services.
ABOUT 3PILLAR GLOBAL
3Pillar Global builds innovative, revenue-generating software products, enabling businesses to quickly turn ideas into value. 3Pillar balances business-minded thinking with engineering expertise in disruptive technologies, such as mobile, cloud, and big data, to develop products that meet real business needs. To date, 3Pillar’s products have driven over $1 billion in revenue for industry leaders like CARFAX, PBS, and numerous others. For more information on the company, please visit http://www.3PillarGlobal.com .
